attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition Gordon Brown (MP) to resign from the position of prime minister before any further harm is done to England at his hand.
Over the last ten years as Chancellor of the Exchequer British pensions were raided and the national debt was increased to out of control.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
